_comment: This is a PLACEHOLDER for the production environment Firebase configuration.
_instructions: 1. Create a Firebase project for production (e.g., 'CyberVPN')
2. Register an Android app with package name: com.cybervpn.cybervpn_mobile
3. Download the google-services.json from Firebase Console
4. Replace this file with the downloaded google-services.json
5. ENSURE the real google-services.json is properly secured and not committed to public repositories
